data.text: @gmacfarlane103 We need to chat! I’m so glad you are being transparent with this. So important.
@gmacfarlane103 It's a thing to be happy about to read that.
@gmacfarlane103 Glad you are on the mend.  That really knocked you off your feet.

@gmacfarlane103 Glad you're doing better. But your covid 19 experience sounds worse than 95% of the unvaccinated people I know ( people of all ages). You would have been better off following the FLCCC's early intervention protocols and not pushing experimental vaccines. 
https://t.co/zMVCUAilq1
@gmacfarlane103 Please watch out for skin cancer it’s got me twice in 5 years

@gmacfarlane103 Wow that’s wild. Glad you’re on the mend. I can’t get over how each person, vaxd or unvaxd, has such a different experience. Mine as an unvaxd person was so much milder than yours, and I’m no runner like you! 😪
